Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: History | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: Channel 4 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Sundays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: October 21, 2012

How Britain Worked sees Guy Martin celebrating the workers of the Industrial Revolution by getting stuck into six of the country's biggest restoration projects, as he helps to bring some of the 19th Century's most impressive engineering achievements back to life.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33146)
